overview: Like a 'Sidewinder' -- a rattlesnake hypnotically moving through the sands of the desert looking for prey -- these 'snakes' are waiting to strike and claim their prize: a fiery fuck under the hot sun. With his cinematic eye and expert sexual direction, Hall of Famer Steve Cruz leads these six hung cowboys through the desert to an oasis of climax in 'Sidewinder.' The blazing sand gets even hotter when Sean Zevran, who's looking for rattlers, gets ahold of the thick, uncut 10-inch 'Sidewinder' in Letterio Amadeo's pants. Nick Sterling's car breaks down in the middle of the scorching heat. Armando De Armas comes to Nick's rescue, and Nick is happy to pay him for his assistance by taking Armando's snake deep inside his sultry hole.
title: Sidewinder
